title: Simple News Assembly Platform: A CMS built for the newsroom
description: A custom Backbone.js CMS for use in the Los Angeles Times newsroom and other tronc markets.

title: Shooters in San Bernardino massacre seemed to be living the 'American Dream'
description: The main online story for the Times' breaking news coverage of the San Bernardino terror attack.

title: This is America's state of mind on election day
description: More than 75 reporters conducted interviews for this collaborative isotope.js project where we asked how the election made people feel.

title: These are the 749 inmates awaiting execution on California's death row
description: An isotope.js project that allows readers to explore the state's condemned inmates and filter by time served, number of victims, and more.

title: A Sting in the Desert
description: In this six-part series, a government-run sting to catch artifact traders upends a Utah town.

title: You want a description of hell?': Oxycontin's 12-hour problem
description: This three-part investigation focuses on the drug known as Oxycontin and what the drug maker knew about its addictive cycle.

title: Belongings
description: A photo-driven project that profiles the homeless of Los Angeles and their most cherished possessions.

title: Fleeing Syria: A desperate migration
description: A series chronicling the one of the largest waves of human migration since World War II.

title: Video: Reporters recall violence in Tiananmen Square
description: Four former Los Angeles Times reporters recall the protests that led to a night of violence in Beijing.
